overview: Simon is an Algerian man who has moved to the south of France. Simon roams from house to house in the town, considered by everyone to be the “idiot of the village”. Simon is in search of not only a job but also acceptance in the society where he finds himself. A small film in the form of a sincere and thoughtful portrait.
tagline: The cash flow problems of Simon, the son of an immigrant in a village in Haut-Var.
title: Mon cher Simon
